positions.title: Geospatial Database Manager
descriptors: Managed over 10 terabytes of raw and processed geospatial data
Processed geospatial data to create ease of use for geospatial technicians
Provided database management and data manipulation training to over 20 geospatial technicians
Created and disseminated over 400 geospatial products in support of training exercises

positions.title: Geospatial Production Lead Specialist
descriptors: Served as lead and sole geospatial technician in Afghanistan in support of Operation Enduring Freedom
Created an automated database to track and maintain all geospatial products that created ease of use and superior organization than all previous methods.

Produced 1,200 mission critical products using ArcGIS, Erdas Imagine, and Envi visual information solutions in support of worldwide military operations as well as in support of humanitarian operations.
Provided 100 expeditious tailored geospatial products in support of combat operations and rescue missions
Recognized by the Secretary of the Navy and awarded the Navy and Marine Corps Commendation Medal for superior performance in duties as the sole geospatial technician in Afghanistan

positions.title: Geospatial Production Chief
descriptors: Supervised and Quality Controlled the production and dissemination of over 1,000 geospatial products in accordance with geospatial accuracy standards.
Developed new analytical tools for hydrographic analysis and product dissemination.
Developed database standards and acquired new data on all high priority areas of interest.
Managed a team of ten marines and was recognized for superior leadership performance.

positions.title: Geographic Informations & Systems Assistance
descriptors: Managed over 1 million geospatial tree inventory points for 300+ cities in California, Arizona and Nevada
Provided database management and data manipulation for geospatial data within SQL server
Created various environmental analysis products in an effort to reduce smog and increase tree planting in several cities
Created and maintained all pertinent city inventory data for 300+ cities in California, Arizona and Nevada

positions.title: GIS Technician
descriptors: Created custom geospatial products in order to serve Yellowstone National Park data reports
Provided database management and data manipulation for geospatial data collected
Created various social analysis products in an effort to view traffic patterns and sites visited within Yellowstone National Park
Created and maintained all pertinent data in order to document all activities within Yellowstone National Park

positions.title: Computer Science Teaching Assistant
descriptors: Conducted teaching hours and assisted students with Software Engineering course material
Implemented new grading techniques for software engineering course testing suites
Independently conducted grading and assessment of student's understanding of course materials
